channel.title: Posts on strootje
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on strootje

item.title: Why I love sports so much
item.description: So recently, while cleaning my house, I discovered that I currently own more pairs of sport shoes than regular shoes. This made me realize how important sports are for me.

item.title: Basic Visual Testing Automated in Travis
item.description: Ever since I have worked on websites I always hated the proces to testing pages in different browsers. And since I created the Scarecrow theme for Hugo and am actually using it on this website I've put off testing for as long as possible. But I noticed the other day the the homepage in chrome, chrome of all browsers, was all messed up.

item.title: Review - Personal Trainer Luc Ludkiewicz
item.description: Fitness has always interested me. I've been doing it on and off for about 2 years now but wasn't getting the results I wanted. So I've decided to hire a Personal Trainer.

item.title: An introductory of myself
item.description: To see what I can do for you, see this page. Hi, my name is Bastiaan Stroosnijder, but good luck pronouncing that. My friends just call me Bas. I'm a 28 year old web/software engineer currently living in the Ntherlands. In July of 2017 they found a critical bug in genetic code which made my heartmuscle grow a lot larger that normal. As there is no fix yet, the surgeon proposed a workaround that consisted of adding an display: none; to the .
